contents.title: PNB / ASNB Raya Ad Balang Kuih Abah
contents.subtitle: To identify a gap within previous Raya ads and develop a unique video that would make PNB & ASNB stand out, evoke emotions and spark introspection, urging viewers to reflect on their relationships and forgiveness.
contents.challenge_result_title: Inspiring Malaysian Audiences to Forgive and Ask for Forgiveness
contents.challenge_description: To identify a gap within previous Raya ads and develop a unique video that would make PNB & ASNB stand out, evoke emotions and spark introspection, urging viewers to reflect on their relationships and forgiveness.
contents.results_description: A Raya ad spun around a father-son relationship, with a highlight on bridging generational gaps and taking accountability for past mistakes. Through cinematic lenses and emotional soundtracks, the video successfully resonated with viewers of all races and ages.
